question: The “Ecowrap” report that is seen in news recently is released by which organisation?
explanation:
The State Bank of India’s economic research report named ‘Ecowrap’, has stated that the Covid 19 pandemic has led to 60% more usage of PMJDY (PM Jan Dhan Yojana) Accounts.
The report has also highlighted that the account has been used more frequently in regions that are more prone to crimes.
